text: Radio Happy Lagoon (or Radio Hapi Lagun in Pijin) is a provincial radio station broadcast by the Solomon Islands Broadcasting Corporation in the Western Province. It operates from the provincial capital, Gizo,"SIBC, Voice of the Nation", Solomon Islands Broadcasting Corporation on 945 kHz in the Medium Wave Band."Radio Happy Isles: Programme Schedule 2001" , Solomon Islands Broadcasting Corporation ==References== Category:Radio stations in the Solomon Islands
title: Radio Happy Lagoon
